description: This file sets up and manages a Socket.IO server instance, handling socket connections, room management for projects and users, and providing access to the Socket.IO instance.

methods.name: initSocket
methods.description: Initializes the Socket.IO server with CORS settings, sets up connection event handling, and manages joining/leaving project rooms.

methods.name: getIo
methods.description: Returns the initialized Socket.IO server instance, throws an error if not initialized.
